title: Sunny 1br apartment in historic carriage house
posting_body: ['Sunny 1br apartment in historic carriage house, above Oak Square, Brighton toward Newton.', "Large, private, 25' x 10' deck, large bedroom, updated galley kitchen with disposal, dishwasher and gas stove, spacious living room, and bathroom.", 'This unit features three closets plus a shoe closet, high, antique barn-board ceilings, wood floors and charming period detail including authentic civil war era, barn-door wall and stained glass entry.', 'Includes:', 'Off-street parking for one car', 'coin-op laundry on premise,', 'landscaping', 'snow removal', 'NO PETS.', 'No utilities included.', 'This property is NON-smoking.', 'Property is located 2 Minutes from the Mass Pike, 10 minutes east to downtown Boston and west to Rt.128 and 2 blocks from Green-line bus stops for Kenmore/Watertown Sq., Central Sq./Kendell and downtown express.', 'One mile from Brighton Landing commuter rail stop.', "Minutes to library, pub, take-out, park, farmer's market, Dunkin Donuts, gas station, and YMCA.", 'NO BROKERS: Principals only, no exceptions.', 'Applications required.', 'All references and employment will be verified.', 'First, last, and security, due at signing.', '\u2028\u2028** IMPORTANT ** \u2028Due to the current Covid-19 Pandemic situation and associated social distancing guidelines, viewings will be limited  to one.', 'When responding include your FULL NAME and PHONE NUMBER.', 'Please make it clear when responding, that you are the principal party and NOT A REAL-ESTATE AGENT or bot  looking for a listing.']
